silverleaf.name: silverleaf
silverleaf.description: A shimmering leaf that catches the light. Probably just looks prettier than it actually is.

needlegrass.name: needlegrass
needlegrass.description: Spiky grass that will absolutely destroy your fingers. Worth it though.

coal.name: coal
coal.description: Perfect for heating things up. Or leaving in someone's stocking if they've been naughty.

oak.name: oak
oak.description: Sturdy wood from a mighty oak tree. Probably solid enough for furniture, but you do you.

rubber duck.name: rubber duck
rubber duck.description: Squeaky. Yellow. Probably belonged to someone's bath time. Still works as a duck though.

boot.name: boot
boot.description: A lonely single boot. Its partner is probably at the bottom of the ocean, living its best life.

seaweed.name: seaweed
seaweed.description: Tangled, slimy, and smells like the ocean. What's not to love?

perch.name: perch
perch.description: A small, spiky fish. Not the most impressive catch, but it'll do.

cod.name: cod
cod.description: A classic fish. Probably swam into your net because it wasn't paying attention.

trout.name: trout
trout.description: A feisty little fighter that put up a decent struggle. Respect the trout.

wheat.name: wheat
wheat.description: Golden grain ready for harvest. The foundation of bread, beer, and broken dreams.

toolrod.name: toolrod
toolrod.description: A perfectly straight rod. Essential for crafting, or just looks cool on a shelf.

binding.name: binding
binding.description: Strong cord that holds things together. Like duct tape, but fancier.

pickaxe mold.name: pickaxe mold
pickaxe mold.description: A mold for casting pickaxes. Heavy, intricate, and smells like it's been through a lot.

axe mold.name: axe mold
axe mold.description: The blueprint for creating axes. This mold means business.

hoe mold.name: hoe mold
hoe mold.description: A mold for hoes. Gardeners everywhere are waiting for this.

machete mold.name: machete mold
machete mold.description: For crafting machetes. Looks dangerously efficient.

fishing rod mold.name: fishing rod mold
fishing rod mold.description: A mold for fishing rods. Every angler's dream, preserved in stone.

animal bone.name: animal bone
animal bone.description: A sturdy bone from a wild animal. Could be useful for crafting or just as a snack for your dog.

coyote fang.name: coyote fang
coyote fang.description: A sharp fang from a plains coyote. Might fetch a good price with the right buyer.

boar leather.name: boar leather
boar leather.description: Tough leather from a mudback boar. Great for crafting durable gear.

boar tusk.name: boar tusk
boar tusk.description: A sharp tusk from a mudback boar. Highly sought after by collectors and craftsmen alike.

spider silk.name: spider silk
spider silk.description: Fine silk harvested from spiders. Strong and lightweight, perfect for crafting.

spider fang.name: spider fang
spider fang.description: A venomous fang from a forest spider. Handle with care.

rabbit hide.name: rabbit hide
rabbit hide.description: Soft hide from a wild rabbit. Useful for crafting light armor or clothing.

rabbit meat.name: rabbit meat
rabbit meat.description: Lean meat from a wild rabbit. A tasty treat when cooked properly.

bear claw.name: bear claw
bear claw.description: A sharp claw from a forest bear. Valuable for crafting and as a trophy.

bear hide.name: bear hide
bear hide.description: Thick hide from a black bear. Highly prized for crafting durable armor and clothing.

fox pelt.name: fox pelt
fox pelt.description: A beautiful pelt from a red fox. Soft and warm, perfect for crafting luxurious garments.

bandit tooth.name: bandit tooth
bandit tooth.description: A jagged tooth taken from a defeated bandit. A grim trophy of victory.
